Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class contains the main Model (MVC) logic of "Eriantys". The class is responsible for the initialization of the game Model, for certain Model and connection status changes, and for the update of the data on the clients.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructor Game provides the basic game setup. Other setup is needed for the game to be playable.

      Method initMotherNature is a setter method for the MotherNature object. This method also fires any changes to the clients.

      motherNature - the MotherNature instance to be set to the game

      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • removePlayedCards

      Method getOrderedActionPlayers returns the ordered players list for the next action phase.

    • setActionOrder

      public Player setActionOrder()
      Method setActionOrder orders the player list based on the planning phase cards for the next action phase. It also checks if the player is currently connected.
      Returns:
      the first player of the action phase.

    • setPlanningOrder

      public Player setPlanningOrder()
      Method setPlanningOrder orders the player list based on the last planning phase cards for the next planning phase. It also takes account if a player is currently connected.
      Returns:
      the first player of the planning phase.

    • getNextPlayerActionPhase

      public Optional<String> getNextPlayerActionPhase(int distance)
      Method getNextPlayerActionPhasePlus computes the next player in action phase, if it's the end of the turn it returns empty Optional type. This method only works if the game is set to the action phase.
      Parameters:
      distance - is the number of players to skip.
      Returns:
      the next player at the specified distance, if there is none, it returns empty.

    • getNextPlayerActionPhase

      public Optional<String> getNextPlayerActionPhase()
      Method getNextPlayerActionPhase computes the next player in action phase, if it's the end of the turn it returns empty Optional type. This method only works if the game is set to the action phase.
      See Also:
      • getNextPlayerActionPhase(int distance)

    • getProfessors

      public EnumMap<Color,String> getProfessors()
      Method getProfessors returns the ownership Map of the professors of the game. The map is structures as Color (the color of the professor) - String (the nickname of the owner).

      public void refillClouds()

    • pickCloud

      public Map<Color,Integer> pickCloud(int cloudIndex) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Method pickClouds lets a user select a cloud, empties the cloud and returns the Map of the students on the clouds.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - the specified cloud index.
      Returns:
      The map of the selected cloud's students.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index selected does not correspond to any cloud.

    • addIslandStudent

      Method addIslandStudent adds a student to the specified island.
      Parameters:
      islandIndex - the specified island index.
      student - the student to be added.

    • setIslandOwner

      public void setIslandOwner(int island, String owner)
      Method setIslandOwner sets the ownership of an island to a specified player.
      Parameters:
      island - the specified island index.
      owner - the owner to be set, identified by his username.

    • setIslandBlock

      public void setIslandBlock(int island, boolean isBlocked)
      Method setIslandBlock sets the blocked flag to a certain island. This is related to the Grandma character card.
      Parameters:
      island - the selected island index.
      isBlocked - the blocking status to be set.
      See Also:
      • Grandma

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Player player, AssistantCard playedCard)
      Method playCard executes a play card action, defined by the removal of the card from the player's and the setting of the old card to the played cards.
      Parameters:
      player - the current player username.
      playedCard - the card to be played.

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Optional<Player> getPlayerByNickname(String username)
      Method getPlayerByNickname returns the player reference from its nickname, if there isn't any player with that nickname it returns the Optional.Empty value.
      Parameters:
      username - the selected player's username
      Returns:
      the player reference if present, Optional.Empty otherwise

    • getPlayerByID

      public Player getPlayerByID(int id)
      Method getPlayerByNickname returns the player reference from its ID. If a player is not player, it returns null.
      Parameters:
      id - the selected player's ID.
      Returns:
      the player reference if present, null otherwise.

    • addPlayerToBeReconnected

      public void addPlayerToBeReconnected(String player)
      Method addPlayerToBeReconnected adds the player to the reconnected list if a player reconnects after having left the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's username.

    • setPlayerConnected

      public void setPlayerConnected(int player, boolean isConnected)
      Method setPlayerConnected sets the player's connection status.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's ID.
      isConnected - true if connected, false otherwise

    • getWaitingPlayersReconnected

      Method getWaitingPlayersReconnected returns the list of the player to be reconnected to the game.

    • reEnterWaitingPlayers

      public void reEnterWaitingPlayers()
      Method reEnterWaitingPlayers moves the players from the reconnected queue to the actual game.
